1369674249842098178.text: No matter the presidential administration, Congress must embrace and retain their role and duty as a body tasked with oversight. As Republicans, we are committed to holding @POTUS accountable for decisions that affect American taxpayers. #MakeItREINS /4

1369674076248289281.text: In this bill, a major rule is defined as a federal rule or regulation that will have an annual economic effect of $100M or more. It would also give Congress oversight of federal rules that affect American companies' ability to compete with foreign entities. #MakeItREINS 3/

1369673829564420097.text: The REINS Act would require every new major rule passed by the executive bureaucracy to be approved by both houses of Congress. For too long, the executive branch has ignored Congress' right to executive oversight. #MakeItREINS 2/

1369673412143157250.text: Today, I am proud to introduce the 2021 REINS Act—Regulations from the Executive In Need of Scrutiny.
